DOC.detailed_description: To specify the long term evolution of Nephronophthisis in terms of renal disease as well as extra-renal damages for patients having a confirmed diagnosis of NPHP1, NPHP2, NPHP3, NPHP4, NPHP5, NPHP6 or NPHP8 gene mutation
DOC.criteria: NPHP1, NPHP2, NPHP3, NPHP4, NPHP5, NPHP6 or NPHP8 gene mutation 7 years old and older MRI contraindications
